posts._title: Jean-Pierre Melville – L’Armée des ombres AKA Army of Shadows [+Extras] (1969)
posts.title: L’Armée des ombres
posts.excerpt: Review: The defiantly independent French director Jean-Pierre Melville was an outsider by choice. He financed his films outside of the studio system and built his own studio for maximum independence. He loved American cinema and made his reputation with a brilliant series of cool gangster thrillers, beginning with elegant, elegiac Bob le Flambeur (1955) and …
